algorithm_technique: Iterate through rows, columns, and 3x3 subgrids, using sets to check for duplicate digits.
problem_summary_simple: Validate if a partially filled Sudoku board follows the rules.
problem_summary_technical: Use sets to track seen digits in each row, column, and 3x3 subgrid. Check for duplicates as you iterate through the board.
key_insights: The core idea is to efficiently check for duplicates in three different contexts: rows, columns, and 3x3 subgrids.
Sets are ideal for this as they provide O(1) average time complexity for insertion and membership checking.
The problem only requires validation of filled cells, so empty cells ('.') can be ignored.
